The template specialization of {{lc|std::formatter}} for {{lc|std::stacktrace_entry}} allows users to convert a stacktrace entry object to string using [[cpp/utility/format|formatting functions]] such as {{lc|std::format}}.

===Format specification===
The syntax of format specifications is:

{{sdsc begin}}
{{sdsc|{{spar optional|fill-and-align}} {{spar optional|width}}}}
{{sdsc end}}

{{spar|fill-and-align}} and {{spar|width}} have the same meaning as in [[cpp/utility/format/formatter#Standard format specification|standard format specification]].

The formatted output matches the result of {{rlpt|to_string}}, adjusted as appropriate for the format specifiers.
